responses.content:
```yaml leads: - headline: "Potential Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Vulnerability" analysis: | The error message is being displayed in a `

` element without any sanitization or escaping. This could lead to a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attack if an attacker manages to insert malicious scripts into error messages that are then reflected back to the user. cwe: CWE-79 function_names: - "showError" filenames: - "src/web/assets/verify/dist/verify.js" classification: very promising ```

leads.headline: Potential Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Vulnerability
leads.analysis:
The error message is being displayed in a

element without any sanitization or escaping. This could lead to a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attack if an attacker manages to insert malicious scripts into error messages that are then reflected back to the user.
